body.p: (Also spelled Biers) Born in Kentucky in 1825. In 1860, lived in Paducah, Kentucky working as a book Clerk. Served in the Confederate Army as a Private in Company I, 3rd Kentucky Cavalry.

bibl.p: William E. Mickle, Well Known Confederate Veterans and Their War Records: Arranged Alphabetically (New Orleans: Wm. E. Mickle, 1915), 131; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McKracken County, District 2 City of Paducah, p. 126.
